DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Research Specimen Identification Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unique numeric identifier assigned to the donor's research sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, establish or revise a theory, or develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredDefinition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, to establish or revise a theory, or to develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: Systematic investigation into a subject in order to discover facts, to establish or revise a theory, or to develop a plan of action based on the facts discovered.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The procedure of having an identity established._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Identified; having the identity known or established.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: The procedure of having an identity established.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
